snippet: Federal grand jurors indicted Antonio Whiteside on charges that he tried to set fire to a convenience store after it was announced that a white police officer wouldn’t face state charges in the death of an unarmed black man.
abstract: Federal grand jury indicts Antonio Whiteside on charges that he attempted to start fire at a Ferguson, Mo, convenience store following announcement that police officer would not face charges in shooting death of Michael Brown.
lead_paragraph: Federal grand jurors indicted Antonio Whiteside on charges that he tried to set fire to a convenience store after it was announced that a white police officer wouldn’t face state charges in the death of an unarmed black man.

headline.main: Indictment in an Arson Attempt in Ferguson
headline.print_headline: Indictment in an Arson Attempt in Ferguson
